cases.title: Contract rate 5% not applied after addendum
cases.summary: Contract addendum effective Sep 9 specified 5.0% rate, but both registry and reconciliation continued charging 4.8% for 37 days (Sep 9 – Oct 16). Total underpayment: 4,226.88 EUR.

cases.title: Registry-Reconciliation commission gap
cases.summary: Registry continued charging 4.8% effective rate while reconciliation switched to 4.2% from Oct 16. The gap persisted through November 30. Total overpayment in registry vs reconciliation: 24,966.10 EUR.
